text: See to it that you complete your work today.
Make sure you complete your work today.
I have little patience for failure, Dr. Kel.
Do not fail me again, Dr. Kel.
Do not make me regret that our institute hired you, Dr. Kel.
Our work relies on you sending the required data.
You have all day to complete this task, Dr. Kel. There should be sufficient spare time for whatever you are doing - AFTER completing your tasks.
Our work relies on you sending the required data.
If you don't consider yourself fit to complete your tasks, let me know.
